text: Then on that Day you will assuredly be questioned about the comforts [of the world].He said:Not an hour of the night or day passes by the jinn and men among creation that does not contain a right (á¸¥aqq) which God holds over them, and which it is incumbent on them [to fulfil], whether they know it or are ignorant of it. And He ascertains their states on the Day of Resurrection.Then he [Sahl] recited: Then on that Day you will assuredly be questioned about the comforts [of the world].His words, Exalted is He:
